trait.name: Iron Scent
entries: Cragbeard can pinpoint, by scent, the location of ferrous metal within 300 feet of it.

action.name: Fist of Iron
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) magical bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Rise
entries: Three times per day, when Cragbeard is about to get hit, he can instead rise himself higher on a pillar made of stone. Doing this, he raises his AC by 5 for the duration of the attacker's turn. The pillar shrinks back into the earth when the attacker's turn is over.

monster.name: Maya Redbeard

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, Maya Redbeard can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, Maya Redbeard can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actionHeader: Multiattack. Maya makes two melee attacks, then uses Leadership.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Leadership
entries: For 1 minute, Maya Redbeard can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a {@dice d4} to its roll provided it can hear and understand Maya Redbeard. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if Maya Redbeard is {@condition incapacitated}.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Maya Redbeard adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, Maya Redbeard must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
